review: Not as smooth as we hoped.  For several reasons switched from AppleTV, but likely will go back to AppleTV.
author: RandyT4MM

review: I was a amazed how fast this thing is.  It's a streaming stick and has the most of the content you would expect.
author: ATS

review: So totally awesome! I actually bought 2. One for home; one for on the go.
author: Linda

review: Initially wanted to watch Amazon Streaming movies so i could get rid of Netflix i never watched but was paying for.  Was told to get Chromecast but after hours of trying found out it doesn't support Prime.  So got the stick - set up in moments and it works great.  Now savings the Netflix monthly fee.
author: W. Jay Reese III

review: This stick is very nice! I was tired of watching movies on my computer so I read all the reviews on this and the price was right so I ordered it.It came very fast and was easy to set up.Just do not forget you will need a power outlet on it as it does not show the cord.Wonderful product and I would recommend this.
author: Sandra Cieklinski
